name: DIY Building Craft Block Miner
description:
► Wanna build a fabulous house all by yourself?! Let's do the construction right now!

No time-consuming strategies and difficult scenarios. The game is anti-stress. ASMR building gives you relaxing and satisfying feeling as it is user-friendly and super easy game. You can build your great house within several minutes!

Now it is time to deep into building process in the most relaxing way: just download the game!

► TRY THE ROLE OF THE EXPERIENCED BUILDER!

No rush, no panic! This anti-stress game is a step-by step guide to professional building. As a builder you experience all necessary stages from pouring the foundation to choosing your paint colors. So the simulator is designed to provide you with real atmosphere of your home building journey.

The ASMR House Build offers the opportunity to plan out each step of the building process: laying the foundation; forming the skeleton of your home; focusing on external areas such as windows, temporary external doors, roof cover, brickwork and walls.
What else? Driveways, walkways and patios. Imagine … You can even create your own backyard and plant wonderful trees! WOW!

► YOUR HOME – YOUR DESIGN!

The ASMR game inspires you to make important decisions about your dream home design. In this game you can customize a house with different pieces of furniture such as wardrobes, cupboards, tables, chairs, beds, sofas and hundreds of other interesting things. Check them out!

Moreover, the simulator gives you a wide range of features to express your creativity while choosing favorite materials and colors. Nothing can get on your way to make unique construction and home design! Isn’t it satisfying? No doubts!

How many houses have you already built? Learn the proper ways to make construction and create your home design with ASMR House Build.

Download the game and start building now!
